data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In the following example we will declare two functions. We ____ then ____ a ____ of ____ by ____ these ____ to ____ of ____ items ____ the ____. We will do this by passing the function name as an argument to another function.
data.partBlankContent: In the following example we will declare two functions. We wi__ then pro____ a li__ of wo___ by appl____ these func_____ to ea__ of t__ items i_ the sequ____. We will do this by passing the function name as an argument to another function.
data.fullContent: In the following example we will declare two functions. We will then process a list of words by applying these functions to each of the items in the sequence. We will do this by passing the function name as an argument to another function.
data.answer: 在下面的示例中，我们将声明两个函数。然后，我们将通过将这些函数应用于序列中的每个项来处理单词列表。我们将通过将函数名作为参数传递给另一个函数来实现这一点。
